text: Bjorn Ulrich a Swedish scientist
announced today that he had created the
world's first human clone at least he
thinks so in the middle of the press
conference another scientists also
claiming to be Bjorn Ulrich burst
through the doors insisting that he was
in fact the real Ulrich and the man at
the podium was actually his clone after
hours of testing it was proven that the
two of them were indeed genetically
identical at the center of the
controversy is the wife of the original
Bjorn Ulrich she is still having a hard
time telling the two apart although she
says she has decided on a favorite when
asked for comment she replied I just
knew it was Bjorn by the way he looked
at me
it was the same look he gave me when we
first met I'm almost positive of that
this experiment has also created a mess
for the Swedish government as both men
have applied for universal health
coverage and retirement benefits the
minister of health was quoted as saying
in Sweden we pride ourselves on having
coverage for every individual but since
there are two of them
everything will be divided right down
the middle fair is fair
